description: a(n) = decimal concatenation of n and n^2.
references: Felice Russo, A set of new Smarandache functions, sequences and conjectures in number theory, American Research Press 2000
formula: a(n) = n*(10^floor(2*log10(n) + 1) + n). - _Henry Bottomley_, May 18 2000a(n) ~ n^3. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 19 2012
prog: (MAGMA) [Seqint(Intseq(n^2) cat Intseq(n)): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 03 2015
author: _Felice Russo_, Feb 25 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 28 2000
